mapper.select:
SELECT B.PHYSDBNAME, B.TABLENAME, B.BIGDATA, A.SYNCHORDER, A.SYNCHCONDITION, A.SYNCHRECOGCOL, nvl(A.TABLETYPE,'1')TABLETYPE, A.PKCOL, A.REMARK, A.FILTERCOL, (CASE WHEN A.PHYSDBNAME IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END) ISSYNCH FROM P#SYNCH_T_SETTING A RIGHT JOIN SYNCH_V_USERTABLE B ON A.PHYSDBNAME = B.PHYSDBNAME WHERE 1 = 1
AND B.PHYSDBNAME LIKE '%${physDBName}%'
AND B.TABLENAME LIKE '%${tableName}%'
ORDER BY A.SYNCHORDER, B.PHYSDBNAME,A.REMARK
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM P#SYNCH_T_SETTING WHERE PHYSDBNAME=#{tableName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO P#SYNCH_T_SETTING (PHYSDBNAME, SYNCHORDER, SYNCHCONDITION, SYNCHRECOGCOL, REMARK, TABLETYPE,FILTERCOL) VALUES (#{synchPO.physDBName}, #{synchPO.synchOrder}, #{synchPO.synchCondition}, #{synchPO.synchRecogCol}, #{synchPO.remark}, #{synchPO.tableType}, #{synchPO.filterCol})
mapper.update: UPDATE P#SYNCH_T_SETTING SET SYNCHORDER = #{synchPO.synchOrder}, SYNCHCONDITION = #{synchPO.synchCondition}, SYNCHRECOGCOL = #{synchPO.synchRecogCol}, TABLETYPE = #{synchPO.tableType}, FILTERCOL = #{synchPO.filterCol}, REMARK = #{synchPO.remark} WHERE PHYSDBNAME = #{synchPO.physDBName}
